question.text: With respect to blood groups, the person having _______ blood group is definitely homozygous.

solution.text: ABO blood group system is controlled by 3 different alleles  <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></msup></math> ,  <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></msup></math>  and i. Person with blood group A may have genotypes  <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></msup></math>  or  <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math> .  Person with blood group B may have genotypes  <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></msup></math>  or  <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math> . Person with blood group O has genotype ii(recessive homozygous).
